title: (39140) Somo - 8A Calle Peñas Blancas
description: Public toilets, clean, free, in the middle of Somo, all the parking around is a blue zone.

title: (39140) - 14B Calle Isla de Mouro
description: Parking in the city center at the edge of the beach (surf club and bar). Meeting point of many surfers. Water point, public WC and shower nearby. Skate park, a lot of passage. You have to be lucky because not many possibilities for a motorhome. Attention, camper reception area at the entrance of the village.

title: (39340) Suances - 3 Barrio la Rasa
description: Public car parks almost on the outskirts of Suances, the only free place where you can park, although the signs indicate c / Quitana 110, now the street is called Marqués de Santillana. Half an hour from Suances on foot.

title: (39140) Somo - 1 Avenida Trasmiera
description: Automatic laundromat. 3 washing machines 8/12 / 15kg and 3 dryers 16kg.

title: (39313) Polanco - 20 Barrio Rinconeda
description: Laundry with easy parking and washing machines for pets, as well as a dryer for pets. No need to bring your soap.

title: (39627) Penagos - 2B Diseminado Sobarzo
description: Bar Raquel, truck stop point, bar / restaurant and shower (very clean) available for a fee!

title: (39313) Rinconeda - 15M Barrio Rinconeda
description: Small but uncrowded dirt car park, with a large children's playground right in front, a couple of wooden tables and a public toilet. Very clean and quiet. Perfect for a stopover. There is no prohibition sign but we don't know if you can stay overnight without problem.

title: (39140) Somo - 49A Barrio Somo
description: Place to park for the day and sleep, there are no people bothering you, you do not have to pay as in the whole town. Nice place, 5 min walk from the beach.

title: (39313) Polanco - 1616 Barrio Rinconeda
description: Large new paved car park next to the stadium, with streetlights but very quiet.

title: (39140) - 11A Barrio Pinar de Arna
description: Large, hilly and grassy parking near the beach. During the busy day during the night, however, almost empty. Had a night without problems.

title: (39140) Somo - 10 Barrio Huyo
description: Large free access car park without height bar. Parking meter off. Free parking. 5 min walk from the beach. Superb sunset.

title: (39360) Suances - 45B Barrio Ongayo
description: Behind a charming little church and along the little cemetery, several tables in a small field. A water tap alongside the church.

title: (39719) -
description: To spend a night in safety. a little noisy, but good.

title: (39650) - 162A Diseminado Penilla
description: Large parking lot next to the cemetery. Two very friendly dogs will keep you company. Surrounded by eucalyptus trees.

title: (39627) Penagos - 6 Lugar Diseminados Arenal
description: To make an overnight stop if you are tired, you can hear the road but the parking lot is very large, spacious squares and the vast majority, flat

title: (39679) - 115 Diseminado Vargas
description: Small shady place, directly on the river with access.

title: (39140) Somo - 3A Barrio Pinar de Arna
description: Asphalted parking, a bit inclined. Along the path of the beach and sidewalks that lead to the village center in two to five minutes.

title: (39360) Ongayo - 45 Carretera Ongayo
description:
Green recreation area with swings, tables, some shades and cool views of the countryside.
The location is good, the traffic on the road is moderate. Space for 3-4 vans, but max. Length 6m. There is also a playground and a water point with clean drinking water.

title: (39620) Sarón - CA-142
description: Laundry

title: (39710) Solares - 5 Poligono Psir Medio Cudeyo
description: Parking for laying meals. A little traffic on the small departmental road. Very clean, no ban information for motorhome.

title: (39350) Suances - Barrio Hinojedo-Muelle
description: Small van place. You can ride a small 2x4 along a track a few meters to the Besaya greenway car park. Quiet, flat place without services. I recommend riding the bike to Suances by the estuary (7km)

title: (39140) Somo - 5 Barrio Pinar de Arna
description: Small parking well leveled with three large seats for ac. 500m beach

title: (39360) Ongayo - 12 Carretera la Tejera
description: Fountain and small park

title: (39710) - S-10
description:
Cheap gas station and you can refill water 
Gas station toilets

title: (39718) Liérganes - 41 Barrio Pámanes
description: It is a car park with about 20 spaces between houses, next to a park with a children's play area, tables to eat, litter bins and a water fountain. We have spent the night several times when we are on the way to other areas and we like it a lot for its tranquility.

title: (39718) Pamanes - 1016 Barrio Pámanes
description: Small parking, in front of playground. There is a fountain and small picnic area.

title: (39620) Sarón - 1021 Barrio Sarón
description: Big parking just outside the town (within walking distance).

title: (39718) Surgencia de La Covachona. - 153 Diseminado Sobremazas
title_short: (39718) Surgencia de La Covachona. - 153 Diseminado Sobremazas
description: Surgencia de La Covachona.. Picnic area with swings, tables and fountain. Small but beautiful park. Two motorhomes enter, level. There is garbage. Nearby is the La Mina animal farm and a reservoir.

title: (39300) Barreda - 373 Avenida Solvay
description: Self-service laundry with 12 and 15 kilo machines and 16 kilo dryers. Change machine for 5 and 10 euro bills. And with ample parking

name: Motorhomes Area Suesa
title: (39160) Motorhomes Area Suesa
description: The best thing is the extent of the plots and with very good access. It is adjacent to the campsite and belongs to the same owners. Wifi, simple sanitary facilities, large loading and unloading area... The price is in line with the rest of the areas. There is electricity only in the first plots. It's a long walk to Somo Beach, but worth it. To improve I would say that it is for the attention of the owner, of which it must be said that it was correct but without excess.

name: Camping Somo Parque Cantabria
title: (39150) Camping Somo Parque Cantabria
description: Camping Somo Parque Cantabria. Small campsite with the essentials. Electricity, free hot showers. Clean bathrooms, with toilet paper. Small pitches, fairly level. Grey/Black water runoff. Restaurant at the entrance of the facilities. There are quite a few stationary caravans, probably from campers who have been in season for years. It has bungalows and mobile homes. They don't take reservations. It has no shop/supermarket. Next to the restaurant is a swimming pool that appears to be private. Supermarket 2 minutes drive away.

title: (39314) Santillana del Mar - 2A Barrio Viveda
description: Park with tables and barbecues, ideal for a stopover. There are two water fountains, press for water, not possible to screw a hose. The first parking lot is accessible for all vehicles, the picknick area with the fontains only for smaller ones.

title: (39660) La Cueva - 3A Diseminado la Cueva
description: Small square to spend a quiet night. there is a fount. It is the village cemetery, few quieter places will be

name: CAMPSITE LATAS
title: (39140) CAMPSITE LATAS
description: Good place, clean and well cared for. Better to go with reservation. At night somewhat noisy in the plots near the nearby public road. Very clean toilets and showers. The place has a good atmosphere. Near the beach (5 minutes walk). Good place to spend several nights without any problem.

title: (39679) Vargas - 1094 Barrio Vargas
description: Self-service laundry. Modern machines, clothes come out clean and smell good. Are there any alternatives. Easy parking at the Dia supermarket opposite.

title: (39679) Vargas - 1061 Barrio Vargas
description: Parking in Vargas for cars, you can park and spend the night without problems.

title: (39140) Somo - 12 Calle Latas
description: PINAR DE ARNA RECREATIONAL AREA A place with tables and fountain. Numerous parkings. In front of a campsite.

title: (39679) Puente Viesgo - 78 Diseminado Presillas
description: Ample parking next to the Church of San Nicolás. Picnic table and chairs. Very calm.

title: (39140) Somo - 122 Calle Latas
description: Free streetparking with big picnic area. Near the beach.

title: (39626) Santa María de Cayón - N-634
description: Service area for loading and unloading, next to the highway and next to a gas station. ideal for a stop on the road. Small shop and restaurant

title: (39160) Somo - 29 Calle Latas
description: Facing the college. Relatively calm in summer. The guardia civil patrols but let us sleep there in a van.

title: (39150) Suesa - 26 Diseminado Suesa
description: Recreation area on the outskirts of the town of Suesa, next to a farm. Green area with four picnic months and plenty of shade. Also, it has a few swings, litter bins, and a large grassy area.

title: (39660) Socobio - 176A Diseminado Pomaluengo
description: CEPSA gas station, with showers included to give you a rinse, opened a month ago.

title: (39710) Solares - 20G Avenida Oviedo
description: Self-service laundry, it is also a locksmith shop

title: (39719) Orejo - 136 Barrio el Ferial
description: Quiet parking near a park with tables and a playground. The railway is 10 meters away but at night we did not hear it. The playground is a little abandoned and the fountain of the park has no water. Good place to spend the night for small vans but we do not know about motorhomes.

title: (39660) Castañeda - Socobio
description: Parking to visit the collegiate church of Santa Cruz de Castañeda. Quiet place, although you can hear the highway. Nearby there is a park for children. We liked it very much.

title: (39710) Solares - 3 Calle Estudio
description:
STUDY STREET
street with a little width where to park and spend the day for a single motorhome of seven and a half meters.
near the Mythological Park, where children can have a good time.
7 minutes walk from the spa

title: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 98 Barrio el Bosque
title_short: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 98 Barrio el Bosque
description: Very quiet and nice place at the end of a street. Great view over the sea with direct access to the beach. Parking is free and very close to all surf schools.

name: Camping Derby Loredo
title: (39160) Camping Derby Loredo
description: Camping Derby Loredo

title: (39710) Solares - 18 Avenida Oviedo
description: Laundry attached to a bar, while you have a coffee you wash and dry your clothes

title: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 21 Calle Bajada a la Playa
title_short: (39160) Ribamontán al Mar - 21 Calle Bajada a la Playa
description: During the day it's fine, but very crowded and at night teenagers come with loud music and some throw firecrackers. Keep in mind that my experience was in August.

title: (39150) - 141 Diseminado Suesa
description: Paid parking. 4 euros a day It is not always open.

title: (39710) Solares - 2A Avenida Oviedo
description: Parking in front of CEPSA gas station next to a playground, drinking water 10m from the parking lot, connection 220 next to the soccer field only 2 exits

title: (39660) Socobio - 35 Calle Socobio
description: Place which has no other interest than being in the shade because under the highway bridge.

title: (39660) Pomaluengo - 117 Calle Pomaluengo
description: Recent area created by the municipality of Castañeda. Attached to the highway but at night it is quite quiet. It has a bike lane that takes you to the tourist town of Puente Viesgo and 1km in the other direction is the playground with a climbing wall and pump track. You have a loading and unloading service, ideal for making a stop along the way.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 78 Calle Caserios
description: Quiet parking both day and night. We have had a good night here. It is next to a playground and a small indoor soccer field. The best thing is that it has garbage, source of drinking water, barbecue and tables with chairs :)

title: (39160) Langre - 87 Barrio el Bosque
description: Small side road for day time parking and to spend the night (or two). The police might pass by but won’t say anything. There is a small path down to the beach. Beautiful hiking trail along the cliffs is only a 2 min walk from here. The town is close by as well where you can find small local stores and restaurants. No services available so make sure to stock up before you come here. Spot is great for both vans and bigger motorhomes.

title: (39300) Torrelavega - 82 Calle Emilio Revuelta
description: There are only 4 delimited places but they are for campers because a large motorhome does not fit. The views without really beautiful. A very nice place.

name: Ocio La Flor
title: (39626) Ocio La Flor
description: Parking space on the farm, nice host. toilet available. Great for kids. 2 hectares of corn maze for children and adults. Kiosk, bar, soccer field, archery, visit to the cow farm and the opportunity to bottle feed the calves. You can swim in the nearby river.

name: Woodland camping
title: (39160) Woodland camping
description: Woodland camping, camping the woodland

title: (39360) Tagle - Unnamed Road
description: Small track located at the top of a cliff, accessible by classic vehicle. Superb view over 189 degrees. In the middle of the fields.

title: (39710) Solares - 57 Avenida Virgen Pilar
description: On lots, ample parking, on one side the bus station and the other emergency room. We arrived and it was full because there is also the sports center, but at the last minute there was nobody, a very quiet area

title: (39160) - 53-37 Barrio el Bosque
description: Good place. Sunset. end of July and nobody was there. Big mosquitoes.

title: (39710) Solares - 26B Paseo de la Estación
description: Free parking next to the train station, easy access and fairly level. Close to restaurants and shops. Taking a walk you can visit the Mina Pepita Mythological Park.

title: (39660) - 83 Calle Pomaluengo
description: On the banks of the Pisueña River in Paluengo. (Cantabria). Quiet place with several sources of drinking water.

title: (39160) Loredo - 104B Barrio Monte Mazo
description: Trankila area, large lawn to get the dogs out, Skate park, Bmx circuit and near the beach and shops

title: (39150) - 8 Calle Calabazas
description: Small and shaded parking. We had dinner and breakfast there with a table and chairs outside. And sleep very peacefully, but ... it is next to a cemetery

title: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - 40A Barrio Sta Maria
title_short: (39694) Santa María de Cayón - 40A Barrio Sta Maria
description: Paved and very level esplanade, at the end of the town. Very calm.

description: Laundry, drying
